## üåü Welcome to My GitHub World!

Hey there! I‚Äôm Rishi, a Junior Platform Engineer at [Kubefirst](https://kubefirst.io/), specializing in Go and Kubernetes. My journey includes an internship at [Graphene AI](https://grapheneai.com/) where I automated cloud infrastructure with Terraform, and a role at [IRIS NITK](https://iris.nitk.ac.in/hrms/) managing data center operations.
